entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 8:24 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:24 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 8:24 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
